name: Easy Thai Lemongrass Chicken Recipe
description: This recipe for Thai lemongrass chicken stir-fry comes together quick and easy.

recipeInstructions.text: Pound the garlic, chilies, and lemongrass with a mortar and pestle.
recipeInstructions.name: Pound the garlic, chilies, and lemongrass with a mortar and pestle.

recipeInstructions.text: Add oil to a large wok or skillet over medium heat. Sauté the spice mixture until fragrant, or approx 20 seconds.
recipeInstructions.name: Add oil to a large wok or skillet over medium heat. Sauté the spice mixture until fragrant, or approx 20 seconds.

recipeInstructions.text: Add chicken and stir-fry until cooked through.
recipeInstructions.name: Add chicken and stir-fry until cooked through.

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in dark soy sauce, oyster sauce, fish sauce, white sugar, water, and add kaffir lime leaves. Thoroughly mix and serve immediately.
recipeInstructions.name: Stir in dark soy sauce, oyster sauce, fish sauce, white sugar, water, and add kaffir lime leaves. Thoroughly mix and serve immediately.

review.reviewBody: Trying it tonight! But have made it before, similar without the black soy. So I'm interested to see if the dark soy makes a difference it's an amazing dish, I use serrano peppers because they're easier to find and very hot. So delicious!!
